policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.4.1
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: http
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: elastic2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: elasticsearch:7.17.16
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: esdata
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: esdata

---

##### FILE: elastic4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms1g -Xmx1g
        - name: bootstrap.memory_lock
          value: "true"
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        image: kuzzleio/elasticsearch
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
      volumes:
      - name: elasticsearch-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-pvc
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-emptydir

---

##### FILE: elastic5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to qa-log-analyzer/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: qa-log-analyzer
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: network.host
          value: 0.0.0.0
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0
        - name: xpack.license.self_generated.type
          value: trial
        - name: xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.enrollment.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms2048m -Xmx2048m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.3
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 20Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---

kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    networking.gke.io/internal-load-balancer-allow-global-access: "true"
    networking.gke.io/load-balancer-type: Internal

    app: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch

  - name: rest
    port: 9200
  - name: inter-node

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

      protocol: UDP

##### FILE: elastic8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elastic/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: elastic
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.15.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/elasticsearch.yml
          name: config-volume
          subPath: elasticsearch.yml
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-data
      - configMap:
          name: elasticsearch-config
        name: config-volume

---

kind: Service

  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: elastic

  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 9200
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 9200
  - name: transport
    port: 9300
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 9300
  selector:

##### FILE: elasticDeploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          value: "12345"
        image: srvn0nm/elasticsearch:v1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/gnomad-elasticsearch-lb:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    cloud.google.com/load-balancer-type: Internal
  name: gnomad-elasticsearch-lb
  namespace: default
spec:
  loadBalancerSourceRanges:
  - 192.168.255.0/24
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 9200
    protocol: TCP
  selector:
    elasticsearch.k8s.elastic.co/cluster-name: gnomad
  type: LoadBalancer

---

##### FILE: ElasticSearch.StatefulSet_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to efklog/DaemonSet/fluentd-es-v2.7.0:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: fluentd-es
    version: v2.7.0
  name: fluentd-es-v2.7.0
  namespace: efklog
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: fluentd-es
      version: v2.7.0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        scheduler.alpha.kubernetes.io/critical-pod: ""
      labels:
        k8s-app: fluentd-es
        version: v2.7.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: FLUENTD_ARGS
          value: --no-supervisor -q
        image: quay.io/fluentd_elasticsearch/fluentd:v2.7.0
        name: fluentd-es
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/fluent/config.d
          name: config-volume
      serviceAccountName: fluentd-es
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - configMap:
          name: fluentd-es-config-v0.2.0
        name: config-volume

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: network.host
          value: 127.0.0.1
        - name: http.port
          value: "9201"
        image: elasticsearch:7.9.3
        name: elasticsearch
      - image: nginx:1.19.5
        name: nginx-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: https
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: elasticsearch-nginx
        name: nginx-config
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: elasticsearch-tls

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch_2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/elasticsearch-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  elasticsearch.conf: |
    server {
        listen 9200 ssl;
        server_name elasticsearch;
        ssl_certificate /certs/tls.crt;
        ssl_certificate_key /certs/tls.key;

        location / {
            proxy_pass http://localhost:9201;
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch-nginx
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch_statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      tolerations:
      - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: elasticsearch-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: rook-ceph-block

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: elasticsearch_statefulset1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

---

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch_statefulset3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.17.8
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: elasticsearch-config
        name: config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi
      storageClassName: standard

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs-azure-hussam
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 100Gi
      storageClassName: managed-premium

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/kube-logging:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/kube-logging:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/kube-logging:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

  namespace: kube-logging

    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch

    spec:

        - name: node.name

            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data

      - command:
        - sh

        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
      namespace: kube-logging
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 50Gi
      storageClassName: nfs-storage-class

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch11_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: local-storage

---

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: kube-logging

  policyTypes:
  - Ingress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/kube-logging:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: kube-logging

  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: local-storage

##### FILE: elasticsearch2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
  serviceName: elasticsearch-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: elasticsearch:6.8.4
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-logging
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch24_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
      namespace: kube-logging
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 50Gi
      storageClassName: nfs-storage-class

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.2.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true

      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data

      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce

        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

##### FILE: elasticsearch31_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitor/Pod/elasticsearch-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch-pod
  namespace: monitor
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - --es.uri=http://elasticsearch:9200
    image: prometheuscommunity/elasticsearch-exporter
    name: prometheus-es-exporter
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9114
      protocol: TCP
  - env:
    - name: discovery.type
      value: single-node
    - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
      value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
    - name: xpack.security.enabled
      value: "false"
    image: elasticsearch:7.13.2
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 9200
      initialDelaySeconds: 180
    name: elasticsearch-cont
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9200
      protocol: TCP
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 9200
      initialDelaySeconds: 30
      periodSeconds: 2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
      name: elasticsearch-storage
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - /bin/bash
    - -c
    - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
    image: elasticsearch:7.13.2
    name: fix-volume-permission
    securityContext:
      privileged: true
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
      name: elasticsearch-storage
  volumes:
  - name: elasticsearch-storage
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: local-disk-elasticsearch-claim

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch31_4.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitor/Pod/kibana-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kibana
  name: kibana-pod
  namespace: monitor
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS
      value: http://elasticsearch:9200
    image: kibana:7.13.2
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 5601
      initialDelaySeconds: 60
    name: kibana-cont
    ports:
    - containerPort: 5601
      protocol: TCP
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 5601
      initialDelaySeconds: 20
      periodSeconds: 2
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - until curl http://elasticsearch:9200; do echo Waiting for ES; sleep 2; done;
    image: curlimages/curl
    name: wait-for-es

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch44.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/ms-rrts-at-elastic:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-rrts-at-elastic
  namespace: production
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-rrts-at-elastic
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-rrts-at-elastic
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xmx1g -Xms1g
        - name: bootstrap.memory_lock
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.http.ssl.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.transport.ssl.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.authc.api_key.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enrollment.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.authc.token.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elasticsearch-password
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.13.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ms-rrts-at-elastic
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: elastic-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-local-storage
          subPath: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-local-storage
      volumes:
      - name: elasticsearch-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-pvc

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch45_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.13.4
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/elasticsearch.yml
          name: elasticsearch-config
          subPath: elasticsearch.yml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: elastic-internal-init-filesystem
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-data
      nodeSelector:
        kakaoi.io/kke-nodepool: universal
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: elasticsearch-config
        name: elasticsearch-config
      - name: elasticsearch-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
  serviceName: elasticsearch-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: elasticsearch:6.8.4
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-logging
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: elasticsearch-backup-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/elasticsearch-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - curl -X PUT 'http://elasticsearch:9200/_snapshot/my-snapshot-repo/$(date
              +%!Y(MISSING)%!m(MISSING)%!d(MISSING)%!H(MISSING)%!M(MISSING)%!S(MISSING))?wait_for_completion=true'
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            image: curlimages/curl
            name: elasticsearch-backup
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: 0 0 * * *

    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)

    io.kompose.service: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default

      io.kompose.service: elasticsearch

        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.32.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/myproject-network: "true"
        io.kompose.service: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.14.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          hostPort: 9200
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: elasticsearch-pods-network-policy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/elasticsearch-pods:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch-pods
  namespace: default
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 9300
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: default
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          common.k8s.elastic.co/type: elasticsearch
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
  - ports:
    - port: 15012
      protocol: TCP
    - port: 15017
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: istio-system
  ingress:
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: elastic-system
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          control-plane: elastic-operator
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: default
    ports:
    - port: 9200
      protocol: TCP
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          kubernetes.io/metadata.name: default
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          common.k8s.elastic.co/type: elasticsearch
    ports:
    - port: 9300
      protocol: TCP
  - from:
    - ipBlock:
        cidr: 10.0.2.0/24
    ports:
    - port: 9200
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      common.k8s.elastic.co/type: elasticsearch

---

  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 9200
    targetPort: http
  - name: http-prometheus
    port: 9114
    targetPort: http-prometheus
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: elasticsearch

---

pass: 2, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: discovery.type
      value: single-node
    - name: bootstrap.memory_lock
      value: "true"
    - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
      value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
    - name: transport.host
      value: 127.0.0.1
    - name: xpack.security.enabled
      value: "false"
    image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.17.7
    name: es7
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9200
      name: http
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 1Gi
  - env:
    - name: ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS
      value: http://localhost:9200
    - name: i18n.locale
      value: zh-CN
    - name: xpack.security.enabled
      value: "false"
    image: docker.elastic.co/kibana/kibana:7.17.7
    name: kibana7
    ports:
    - containerPort: 5601
      name: kibana
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 500Mi

##### FILE: elasticsearch-ss_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v6.2.4
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
      version: v6.2.4
  serviceName: elasticsearch-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v6.2.4
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/elasticsearch:v6.2.4
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-logging
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ClusterRoleBinding/elasticsearch-logging:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system
roleRef:
  apiGroup: ""
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: elasticsearch-logging
subjects:
- apiGroup: ""
  kind: ServiceAccount
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system

##### FILE: elasticsearch-ss1_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v6.2.4
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
      version: v6.2.4
  serviceName: elasticsearch-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v6.2.4
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/elasticsearch:v6.2.4
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-logging
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging failed:

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/0/resources/

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/StatefulSet/elasticsearch-logging:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v6.2.4
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
      version: v6.2.4
  serviceName: elasticsearch-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v6.2.4
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/elasticsearch:v6.2.4
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-logging
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/elasticsearch:v6.2.4
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: elasticsearch-logging
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to logging/StatefulSet/es:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es
  namespace: logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-0,es-1,es-2
        - name: discovery.zen.minimum_master_nodes
          value: "2"
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: elasticsearch
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        - name: network.host
          value: 0.0.0.0
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.13.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      nodeSelector:
        es: log
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: dev-nfs-storage

##### FILE: elasticsearch-statefulset2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.zen.ping.unicast.hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch
        - name: discovery.zen.minimum_master_nodes
          value: "1"
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker pull docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-oss:6.8.23
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: es-pvc
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: es-pvc
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: es-pvc
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce

##### FILE: elasticsearch-stfset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/StatefulSet/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: elasticsearch
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          value: elasticsearch-cluster
        - name: NODE_NAME
          value: elasticsearch-master
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms256m -Xmx256m
        - name: ELASTIC_USERNAME
          value: elastic
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          value: elastic123
        - name: KIBANA_SYSTEM
          value: kibana123
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: elasticsearch-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: client
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: nodes
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 768Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 768Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/elasticsearch.yml
          name: elasticsearch-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: elasticsearch.yaml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-pvc
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-pvc
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: elasticsearch-cm
        name: elasticsearch-config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: elasticsearch-pvc
      namespace: monitoring
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 200Mi
      storageClassName: ""
      volumeName: elasticsearch-pv

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/StatefulSet/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: elasticsearch
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          value: elasticsearch-cluster
        - name: NODE_NAME
          value: elasticsearch-master
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms256m -Xmx256m
        - name: ELASTIC_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: elasticsearch-secrets
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: elasticsearch-secrets
        - name: KIBANA_SYSTEM
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: kibana-secrets
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.11.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: elasticsearch-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: client
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: nodes
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 768Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 768Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/config/elasticsearch.yml
          name: elasticsearch-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: elasticsearch.yaml
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-pvc
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-pvc
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: elasticsearch-cm
        name: elasticsearch-config
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: elasticsearch-pvc
      namespace: monitoring
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 200Mi
      storageClassName: ""
      volumeName: elasticsearch-pv

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: elasticsearch
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: elasticsearch
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:

  template:

    spec:

      - env:
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          value: elasticsearch-cluster
        - name: NODE_NAME

          value: -Xms256m -Xmx256m

              key: username
              name: elasticsearch-secrets
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: elasticsearch-secrets
        - name: KIBANA_SYSTEM
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: kibana-secrets

          name: nodes

          name: elasticsearch-config

##### FILE: elasticsearch-stfullset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-logging/StatefulSet/es-cluster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: es-cluster
  namespace: kube-logging
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  serviceName: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: cluster.name
          value: k8s-logs
        - name: node.name
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: discovery.seed_hosts
          value: es-cluster-0.elasticsearch,es-cluster-1.elasticsearch,es-cluster-2.elasticsearch
        - name: cluster.initial_master_nodes
          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.4.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: managed-premium

---

          value: es-cluster-0,es-cluster-1,es-cluster-2
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.4.0
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        name: fix-permissions
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ulimit -n 65536
        image: busybox
        name: increase-fd-ulimit
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi
      storageClassName: oci

              fieldPath: metadata.name

          value: es-cluster-0

          value: 0.0.0.0

          value: "true"

          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: kibana-password

        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: rest
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: inter-node
          protocol: TCP

            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2Gi

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi

        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: data

      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data

          privileged: true

##### FILE: elastic-stack_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/fluentd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: fluentd-logging
    version: v1
  name: fluentd
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: fluentd-logging
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: fluentd-logging
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: K8S_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elasticsearch-logging
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_SCHEME
          value: http
        - name: FLUENTD_SYSTEMD_CONF
          value: disable
        - name: FLUENT_CONTAINER_TAIL_EXCLUDE_PATH
          value: /var/log/containers/fluent*
        - name: FLUENT_CONTAINER_TAIL_PARSER_TYPE
          value: /^(?<time>.+) (?<stream>stdout|stderr)( (?<logtag>.))? (?<log>.*)$/
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_SSL_VERIFY
          value: "true"
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_SSL_VERSION
          value: TLSv1_2
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_USER
          value: elastic
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        image: fluent/fluentd-kubernetes-daemonset:v1-debian-elasticsearch
        name: fluentd
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
        - mountPath: /var/log/pods
          name: dockercontainerlogdirectory
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/fluent/config.d
          name: config-volume
      serviceAccount: fluentd
      serviceAccountName: fluentd
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/pods
        name: dockercontainerlogdirectory
      - configMap:
          name: fluentd-config
        name: config-volume

---

    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v6.2.5
  name: elasticsearch-logging
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
      version: v6.2.5
  serviceName: elasticsearch-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: elasticsearch-logging
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v6.2.5
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/elasticsearch:v6.2.5
        name: elasticsearch-logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: db
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9300
          name: transport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: elasticsearch-logging
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: alpine:3.6
        name: elasticsearch-logging-init
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      serviceAccountName: elasticsearch-logging
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: elasticsearch-logging
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 31Gi
      storageClassName: cloud-ssd

---
