##### FILE: emptydir12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/emptydir-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: emptydir-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      echo "Hello from the first container!" > /cache/message.txt; sleep 3600;
    image: alpine
    name: container1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /cache
      name: cache-volume
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      sleep 5; cat /cache/message.txt; sleep 3600;
    image: alpine
    name: container2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /cache
      name: cache-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: cache-volume

---

##### FILE: emptydir13.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/filebeat-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filebeat.yml: |
    filebeat:
      config:
        mondules:
          path: /usr/share/filebeat/modules.d/*.yaml
          reload:
            enable: true
      modules:
      - module: nginx
        access:
          var.paths: ["/var/log/nginx/access.log*"]
        error:
          var.paths: ["/var/log/nginx/error.log*"]
    output:
      elasticsearch:
        hosts: ["elasticsearch:9200"]
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    demo: filebeat
  name: filebeat-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: emptydir13_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
    demo: emptydir
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
      demo: emptydir
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
        demo: emptydir
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: nginx-logs
      - image: docker.elastic.co/beats/filebeat:7.17.3
        name: filebeat-sidecar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: nginx-logs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/filebeat/filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-config
          subPath: filebeat.yml
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: nginx-logs
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: filebeat.yml
            path: filebeat.yml
          name: filebeat-config
        name: filebeat-config

---

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    run: webserver
  name: webserver
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx-webserver

    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: web-data

    - git
    - clone
    - https://github.com/shamimice03/demo-init-container.git
    - /temp-repo
    image: alpine/git
    name: git

    - mountPath: /temp-repo
      name: web-data
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: web-data

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mongo-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/silly-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  name: silly-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: silly-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB
          value: fs
        image: ghcr.io/vfarcic/silly-demo:1.4.235-alpine
        name: silly-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: silly-cache
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: silly-cache

---

##### FILE: emptydir20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment-emptydir:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: deployment-emptydir
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-emptydir
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: app-emptydir
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo "logging" >> /cache/logs.txt; sleep 1; done
        image: alpine:latest
        name: app
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: cache-volume
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - tail -F /cache/logs.txt
        image: alpine:latest
        name: log
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume

---

kind: Pod

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

  namespace: default

  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo Suceess!! > /output/output.txt; sleep 5; done
    image: busybox
    name: busybox1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /output
      name: my-volume
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do cat /input/output.txt; sleep 5; done
    image: busybox
    name: busybox2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /input
      name: my-volume
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: my-volume

---

##### FILE: emptyDir-2containers.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: html
  - args:
    - while true; do echo $(hostname) $(date) >> /html/index.html; sleep 10; done
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    image: alpine
    name: alpine
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /html
      name: html
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  restartPolicy: Always
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: html
status: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/empty-dir-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: empty-dir-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo Suceess!! > /output/output.txt; sleep 5; done
    image: busybox
    name: busybox1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /output
      name: my-volume
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do cat /input/output.txt; sleep 5; done
    image: busybox
    name: busybox2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /input
      name: my-volume
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: my-volume

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

    - /bin/bash

##### FILE: emptyDir-demo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/emptydir-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: busybox
    purpose: emptydir-demo
  name: emptydir-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - date >> /cache/date.txt; sleep 1000
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    image: busybox
    name: container-1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /cache
      name: cache-volume
  - args:
    - cat /cache/date.txt; sleep 1000
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    image: busybox
    name: container-2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /cache
      name: cache-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: cache-volume

---

##### FILE: empty-dir-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/emptydir-volume:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: emptydir-volume
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: emptydir-volume
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: emptydir-volume
      name: emptydir-volume-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - touch /acompletenoobsmoke/test.txt && sleep 4000
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: busybox
        name: one
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /acompletenoobsmoke
          name: cache
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "4000"
        image: busybox
        name: two
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /foo
          name: cache
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    run: emptydirvol
  name: emptydirvol
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo "Print From vol" && tail -f /dev/null; done;
    image: busybox
    name: emptydirvol
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /cache
      name: cache
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  restartPolicy: Always
  volumes:
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 100Mi
    name: cache
status: {}

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:

              name: emsvc-secret

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql-url
              name: mysql-config

              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret

              key: redis-url

  podSelector:

##### FILE: EnableContainerInsights_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to amazon-cloudwatch/DaemonSet/fluentd-cloudwatch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: fluentd-cloudwatch
  namespace: amazon-cloudwatch
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: fluentd-cloudwatch
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        configHash: 8915de4cf9c3551a8dc74c0137a3e83569d28c71044b0359c2578d2e0461825
      labels:
        k8s-app: fluentd-cloudwatch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AWS_REGION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: logs.region
              name: cluster-info
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cluster.name
              name: cluster-info
        - name: CI_VERSION
          value: k8s/1.3.10
        image: fluent/fluentd-kubernetes-daemonset:v1.7.3-debian-cloudwatch-1.0
        name: fluentd-cloudwatch
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config-volume
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /fluentd/etc
          name: fluentdconf
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/containers
          name: varlibdockercontainers
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /run/log/journal
          name: runlogjournal
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log/dmesg
          name: dmesg
          readOnly: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp /config-volume/..data/* /fluentd/etc
        image: busybox
        name: copy-fluentd-config
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config-volume
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /fluentd/etc
          name: fluentdconf
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - ""
        image: busybox
        name: update-log-driver
      serviceAccountName: fluentd
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: fluentd-config
        name: config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: fluentdconf
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker/containers
        name: varlibdockercontainers
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/log/journal
        name: runlogjournal
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/dmesg
        name: dmesg

---

##### FILE: EnableContainerInsights_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to amazon-cloudwatch/DaemonSet/cloudwatch-agent:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: cloudwatch-agent
  namespace: amazon-cloudwatch
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: cloudwatch-agent
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: cloudwatch-agent
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: HOST_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: HOST_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: K8S_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: CI_VERSION
          value: k8s/1.3.10
        image: amazon/cloudwatch-agent:1.247352.0b251908
        name: cloudwatch-agent
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cwagentconfig
          name: cwagentconfig
        - mountPath: /rootfs
          name: rootfs
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/docker.sock
          name: dockersock
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker
          name: varlibdocker
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /run/containerd/containerd.sock
          name: containerdsock
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /dev/disk
          name: devdisk
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: cloudwatch-agent
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: cwagentconfig
        name: cwagentconfig
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: rootfs
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/docker.sock
        name: dockersock
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/docker
        name: varlibdocker
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/containerd/containerd.sock
        name: containerdsock
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/disk/
        name: devdisk

---

##### FILE: ENDPOINT_EXPLOIT.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/endpoints-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kubehound-edge-test
    app.kubernetes.io/name: webproxy
  name: endpoints-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do sleep 30; done;
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - --
    image: ubuntu
    name: endpoints-pod
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      name: http-web-svc
    - containerPort: 1111
      hostPort: 1112
      name: host-port-svc
    - containerPort: 9999

##### FILE: engine-core-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/env-l05et1xpq7lw-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: env-l05et1xpq7lw
  name: env-l05et1xpq7lw-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: env-l05et1xpq7lw
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: env-l05et1xpq7lw
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CACHE_HOSTNAME
          value: redis-master
        - name: CACHE_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: redis-password
        - name: QUEUE_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: rabbitmq-default-user
        - name: QUEUE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: rabbitmq-default-user
        - name: QUEUE_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: rabbitmq-default-user
        - name: CLUSTER_DB_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clusterDBURI
              name: cluster-secrets
        - name: CLUSTER_DB_USER
          value: mongo-user
        - name: CLUSTER_DB_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-admin-password
        - name: MASTER_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: masterToken
              name: cluster-secrets
        - name: ACCESS_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: accessToken
              name: cluster-secrets
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: PASSPHRASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passPhrase
              name: cluster-secrets
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jwtSecret
              name: cluster-secrets
        - name: CLUSTER_ACCESS_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clusterAccessToken
              name: cluster-secrets
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: default
        - name: AGNOST_ENVIRONMENT_ID
          value: env-l05et1xpq7lw
        - name: AGNOST_ENGINE_ID

    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ensemble-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ensemble-editor-role

  - get
  - list
  - patch

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/ensemble-operator-system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: ensemble-operator-system
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:

##### FILE: ensemble-operator_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ensemble-operator-system/Deployment/ensemble-operator-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ensemble-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ensemble-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: ensemble-operator-controller-manager
  namespace: ensemble-operator-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: ghcr.io/converged-computing/ensemble-operator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: ensemble-operator-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:

kind: NetworkPolicy

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: ensemble-operator-system

  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

##### FILE: ensemble-operator-dev_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ensemble-operator-system/Deployment/ensemble-operator-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ensemble-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ensemble-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: ensemble-operator-controller-manager
  namespace: ensemble-operator-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=0
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.15.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: ghcr.io/converged-computing/ensemble-operator:test
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: ensemble-operator-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: kube-rbac-proxy
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ensemble-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: metrics-reader
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ensemble-operator
  name: ensemble-operator-metrics-reader
  namespace: default
rules:
- nonResourceURLs:
  - /metrics
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: env7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/dependent-envars:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: dependent-envars
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do echo -en '\n'; printf URL=$URL'\n'; sleep 30; done;
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    env:
    - name: PROTOCOL
      value: https
    - name: URL
      value: $(PROTOCOL)://localhost:8080
    image: busybox:1.36.1
    name: demo

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    purpose: demonstrate-env-var-2
  name: env-var-2
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - args:
    - $(WORDPRESS_VERSION) $(WORDPRESS_USER)

    - echo
    env:
    - name: WORDPRESS_VERSION
      value: 5.2.2
    - name: WORDPRESS_USER
      value: ubuntu
    image: wordpress
    name: env-var

##### FILE: environment-variable.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nodejs-writer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    name: nodejs-writer
  name: nodejs-writer
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: HTML_LOCATION
      value: /app/folder-from-env
    image: khannedy/nodejs-writer
    name: nodejs-writer
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /app/folder-from-env
      name: html
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: html

---

##### FILE: env-variables-pod_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/env-variables:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: env-variables
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do echo -en '\n'; printenv MY_POD_NAME; printenv MY_MEM_REQUEST
      MY_MEM_LIMIT; printenv MY_CONST_VALUE; printenv MY_SECRET_VALUE; sleep 10; done;
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    env:
    - name: MY_POD_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.name
    - name: MY_MEM_REQUEST
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          containerName: test-container
          resource: requests.memory
    - name: MY_MEM_LIMIT
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          containerName: test-container
          resource: limits.memory
    - name: MY_CONST_VALUE
      value: test-const-value
    - name: MY_SECRET_VALUE
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: username
          name: secret-env
    - name: MY_CM_VALUE
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: test
          name: configmap-env
    image: registry.k8s.io/busybox
    name: test-container
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 64Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 125m
        memory: 32Mi
  restartPolicy: Never

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/env-variables

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/env-variables failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/env-variables failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/env-variables failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/env-variables:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: env-variables
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do echo -en '\n'; printenv MY_POD_NAME; printenv MY_MEM_REQUEST
      MY_MEM_LIMIT; printenv MY_CONST_VALUE; printenv MY_SECRET_VALUE; sleep 10; done;
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    env:
    - name: MY_POD_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.name
    - name: MY_MEM_REQUEST
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          containerName: test-container
          resource: requests.memory
    - name: MY_MEM_LIMIT
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          containerName: test-container
          resource: limits.memory
    - name: MY_CONST_VALUE
      value: test-const-value
    - name: MY_SECRET_VALUE
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: username
          name: secret-env
    - name: MY_CM_VALUE
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: test
          name: configmap-env
    image: registry.k8s.io/busybox
    name: test-container
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 250m
        memory: 64Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 125m
        memory: 32Mi
  restartPolicy: Never

---
